steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2tmvq","text":"Transform E. coli BL21 cells with the pET vector containing 6x-His-RAB1A(Q70L) by heat shock.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":10,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1tklq","text":"Plate the transformed cells on ampicillin-resistant plates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2uevq","text":"Inoculate a single colony into   of LB broth.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bc29u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"27l8a","text":"Transfer the entire pre-culture into a 1 L culture flask.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"sk3b","text":"Grow the   culture at   with shaking at   until the optical density (OD) reaches approximately 0.6.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":22,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b3hes","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"220","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5sdvi","text":"Place the flask in an ice bath for   to cool rapidly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1vlkc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"as5vt","text":"Induce protein expression by adding   IPTG.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4bq1m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"567p6","text":"Continue incubating the culture   (approximately 16 hours) at   with shaking at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":62,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":80,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"180","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7t8gd","text":"Harvest the cells by centrifugation at   in a BECKMAN Coulter centrifuge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"attog","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"4000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"an5be","text":"Flash freeze the pellet in liquid nitrogen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4go35","text":"Store the frozen pellet at   until purification.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b6lv1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"epsp7","text":"Add an EDTA-free protease inhibitor tablet (Thermo Fisher) and PMSF to a concentration of  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":90,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"atl2","text":"Lyse the cells by sonication using a 5-second on, 5-second off cycle at 50% power for a cumulative time of  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":107,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":360,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d6uqr","text":"Centrifuge the lysate at   to clarify.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"54sn3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"17000","duration":2700,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":33}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1ctk0","text":"Apply the supernatant to a Ni-NTA column (3x).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"839uf","text":"Wash the column until the wash buffer is free of protein, as measured by a Bradford assay.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e9ecp","text":"Elute the protein using a wash buffer containing   imidazole.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":49,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"300","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"akdv4","text":"Concentrate the eluted protein.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9sruj","text":"Apply the concentrated protein to an S75 10/300 column in buffer containing   HEPES  ,   NaCl,   MgCl2, and   TCEP.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":101,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":76,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":84,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":87,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":95,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":108,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"25","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"1":{"type":"ph","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"","id":0,"number":"7.5"}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"150","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"4":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7a6f9","text":"Concentrate the purified protein to a final concentration of  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"50","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ler9","text":"Divide the protein into   aliquots.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
